result.name: Whole-genome sequencing of native chicken ecotypes and variant discovery associated with high-altitude adaptation: Highlighting the mitochondrial DNA variation
result.description: In this project, whole genome sequencing of five highland chickens (Isfahan, Altitude= 2087 m) and five lowland chickens (Mazandaran, Altitude= 54 m) were performed for discovering of genomic variants specially, mt-DNA variants and genomic regions associated with high-altitude adaptation
result.center: Institue of biotechnology, Shiraz university , Iran
